text: Kya yeh log kuch aisey sharik e khuda rakhte hain jinhon ne inke liye deen ki noiyat rakhne wala ek aisa tareeka muqarrar kardiya hai jiska Allah ne izan nahin diya? Agar faislay ki baat pehle tai na ho gayi hoti to inka qaziya chuka diya gaya hota. Yaqeenan in zaalimon ke liye dardnaak azaab hai
